name: Durin Ironlung
title: Entertainment Manager
description: A grizzled dwarf with a voice that can be heard across the mine shaft. He books entertainment for miners who want to blow off steam after long shifts.

greeting.first_time: Aye? I'm Durin. Handle the music here. Ye a performer?
greeting.returning: Back to play again, eh? Good!
greeting.already_performed: Already played today. Come back tomorrow if ye want another go.

ask_about_performing.text: Miners like loud music—work songs, drinking songs, somethin' with rhythm. Ye play once a day, we pay based on what ye play and how well ye work the crowd. Charisma counts.

ask_about_rates.text:
Here's what we pay for:

Drum: 15 gold - best for work rhythms
Horn: 14 gold - drinking songs
Bagpipe: 13 gold - dwarven tradition
Shawm: 11 gold - loud enough
Lute: 10 gold
Viol: 8 gold

No flutes, lyres, or pan flutes. Too soft—can't hear 'em over the miners! Plus yer charisma bonus.
